title: A Damsel in Distress
author: P. G. Wodehouse
description: A composer meets a young woman and tracks her down to a country manor, where a case of mistaken identity leads to comedy.
longDescription: An American composer, George Bevan, falls in love with a mysterious young lady who takes refuge in his taxicab one day. He tracks her down to an English country manor, where a case of mistaken identity leads to all manner of comedy and excitement.
The novel was first serialized in The Saturday Evening Post in 1919. It was later adapted into a silent film, a stage play, and a musical starring Fred Astaire.
